title: Episode #684 - The Toothless Dragon - Michael Che, Danny Brown, Ari Shaffir, & Janeane Garofalo
description:
Michael Che, Danny Brown, Ari Shaffir, & Janine Garofalo join Big Jay Oakerson and Luis J. Gomez, to discuss some funny things that happened before the show, who will replace Dave Smith, Danny’s experience in high school, and a comedian accused of saying the N word on a cruise ship. Plus, the guys play a round of “Who’s Most Justified?” All This and More, ONLY on The Most Offensive Podcast on Earth, The LEGION OF SKANKS!!! 

Air Date: 09/26/22

Support our sponsors! 

  • Fans over the age of 21, head to YoDelta.com and use promo code GAS for 25% off your order!
  • Head to RockAuto.com for all your auto-part needs, and let them know you heard about them on Legion of Skanks Podcast!
  • Head to SheathUnderwear.com and use promo code SKANKS for 20% off your entire order!


FOLLOW THE WHOLE SHOW ON SOCIAL MEDIA!
